name: Cure For Apathy
description: Cure For Apathy is a FNaF inspired physchological horror meta-game with no jumpscares. The game takes place on an alternative universe, where humans and anthropomorfic animals co-exist in peace. In that universe, there's a dog called Scars, who is dealing with constant nightmares because of his depression, caused by the break-up with his boyfriend, Ribby the bunny.
